children.name: AssertionError: Peer NODE_2:quay.io/wakuorg/nwaku-pr:3234 couldn't find any messages

AssertionError: Expected 'Incorrect base64 string' error, got Error: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://127.0.0.1:19138/store/v3/messages?hashes=%23%23%23INVALID%20HEX%23%23%23&pageSize=50&ascending=true with response: b'Exception converting hex string to bytes: hex string must have even length'
assert 'waku message hash parsing error: Incorrect base64 string' in "Error: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: http://127.0.0.1:19138/store/v3/messages?hashes=%23%23%23INVALID%20HEX%23%23%23&pageSize=50&ascending=true with response: b'Exception converting hex string to bytes: hex string must have even length'"

Exception: Error: 500 Server Error: Internal Server Error for url: http://127.0.0.1:30468/store/v3/messages?includeData=True&pubsubTopic=%2Fwaku%2F2%2Frs%2F3%2F0&startTime=1738237490130408960&endTime=2429437494375398912&pageSize=20&ascending=true with response: b'error in handleSelfStoreRequest: BAD_RESPONSE: archive error: INVALID_QUERY: time range should be smaller than one day in nanos'

Exception: Error: 500 Server Error: Internal Server Error for url: http://127.0.0.1:15331/store/v3/messages?pubsubTopic=%2Fwaku%2F2%2Frs%2F3%2F0&startTime=1738237566672537088&endTime=1738237566672537088&pageSize=20&ascending=true with response: b'error in handleSelfStoreRequest: BAD_RESPONSE: archive error: INVALID_QUERY: startTime should be before endTime'
